Identification.LongTitle: An Act to establish the Canadian Heritage Languages Institute

Statute.Repealed: [Repealed before coming into force, 2008, c. 20, s. 3]

Provision.Text: Her Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate and House of Commons of Canada, enacts as follows:
